Usage example

Controller code:


            this.modal = false;
            this.showModal = function() {
                this.modal = true;
            };
            this.hideModal = function() {
                this.modal = false;
            };

In template:


            <button class="btn btn-small" ng-click="mainCtrl.showModal()">Show Modal</button>

            <div modal-dialog="" show="mainCtrl.modal">
                <div class="panel-body">
                    <div class="modal-header">
                        <button type="button" ng-click="mainCtrl.hideModal()" class="close" aria-label="Close">
                            <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
                        </button>
                        <h4 class="modal-title">Dialog Title</h4>
                    </div>
                    <div class="modal-body">
                        <p>Modal content&hellip;</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="modal-footer">
                        <button type="button" ng-click="mainCtrl.hideModal()" class="btn btn-primary">Save changes</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
